featured.text: A giant egg-timer will be set up in the Place de la Concorde and its sand will begin running after a solar eclipse scheduled on April 11, 1999.

definition.zh_def: 音樂中的一個音符，通常是音階中的第六個音。
definition.en_def: A musical note, typically the sixth note of a scale.
definition.example: In the song, the note 'la' follows 'sol' in the melody.
